info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 24 at 12:49PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT NORTH CENTRAL BIG HORN AND SOUTHERN YELLOWSTONE COUNTIES... At 1245 PM MST, a band of heavy snow was located along a line extending from 13 miles northeast of Crow Agency to 7 miles southwest of Laurel. Movement was north at 20 mph. This heavy band of snow could produce a quick 1 to 2 inches of snowfall. Locations impacted include... Billings, Hardin, Laurel, Lockwood, Shepherd, Huntley, Crow Agency, Ballantine and Worden. Visibilities could be below one quarter of a mile in this band of heavy snow and roads could rapidly deteriorate for a short amount of time. If you are driving, slow down and be on alert for other motorists. Low visibility shortens the amount of time you have to react to situations.
